data.name: GetCompany
data.value: Select CompanyId, DistrictId, CompanyName, CompanyHead from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] where DeletedDate is null

data.name: GetCompanybyId
data.value: Select DistrictId, CompanyName, CompanyHead from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] where DeletedDate is null and CompanyId = @companyId

data.name: InsertCompany
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] (DistrictId, CompanyName, CompanyHead, CreatedDate) values (@districtId, @companyName, @companyHead, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateCompany
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] set DistrictId = @districtId, CompanyName = @companyName, CompanyHead = @companyHead, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where CompanyId = @companyId

data.name: GetCompanybyCountry
data.value: Select CompanyCountryId, CountryId, DistrictId, CompanyId, CountryHead, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[CompanyCountry] where DeletedDate is null and CountryId = @countryId

data.name: GetCompanyCountrybyId
data.value: Select DistrictId, CompanyId, CountryId, CountryHead, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[CompanyCountry] where DeletedDate is null and CompanyCountryId = @companyCountryId

data.name: InsertCompanyCountry
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[company].[CompanyCountry] (CompanyId, CountryId, DistrictId, Countryhead, isOperational, CreatedDate) values (@companyId, @countryId, @districtId, @countryHead, @isOperational, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateCompanyCountry
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[company].[CompanyCountry] set DistrictId = @districtId, CountryHead = @countryHead, isOperational = @isOperational, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where CompanyCountryId = @companyCountryId

data.name: GetShowroom
data.value: Select ShowroomId, CompanyId, DistrictId, ShowroomName, AddressLine1, Pincode, BranchManager, hasSales, hasService, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] where DeletedDate is null

data.name: GetShowroombyId
data.value: Select CompanyId, DistrictId, ShowroomName, AddressLine1, Pincode, BranchManager, hasSales, hasService, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId

data.name: InsertShowroom
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] (CompanyId, DistrictId, ShowroomName, AddressLine1, Pincode, BranchManager, hasSales, hasService, isOperational, CreatedDate) values (@companyId, @districtId, @showroomName, @AddressLine1, @pincode, @branchManager, @hasSales, @hasService, @isOperational, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateShowroom
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] set DistrictId = @districtId, ShowroomName = @showroomName, AddressLine1 = @addressLine1, Pincode = @pincode, BranchManager = @branchManager, hasSales = @hasSales, hasService = @hasService, isOperational = @isOperational, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where ShowroomId = @showroomId

data.name: GetShowroombyDistrict
data.value: Select ShowroomId, CompanyId, DistrictId, ShowroomName, AddressLine1, Pincode, BranchManager, hasSales, hasService, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] where DeletedDate is null and DistrictId = @districtId

data.name: GetShowroombyCompany
data.value: Select ShowroomId, CompanyId, DistrictId, ShowroomName, AddressLine1, Pincode, BranchManager, hasSales, hasService, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Showroom] where DeletedDate is null and CompanyId = @companyId
